elements.name: Verify that user can successfully register with suitable credentials.

steps.name: User enters a randomly generated email
User clicks on the submit button
User should land on home page

elements.name: Verify that user can successfully verify account via an email.

comments.value: # Each email confirmation requires a new instance of new email account creation
# In this scenario I only provide a validation of already registered and confirmed account
# Please Note that in the above scenario a random generated email is used, but in this
# email a real email used which has a confirmation email in it
# The purpose here is showing how same steps can be used for real email same purposes

steps.name: User enters "check24qa" and "&6Mu2tafa" and logs in
User searches and enters into confirmation email
User should see confirmation button and click on it

elements.name: User lands on check24 page, then navigates to registiration page
Verify that user can successfully register with suitable credentials.

comments.value: # Used basic parameterization for password and repeated password
# If same email is used in one of the successful registrations beforehand, system will reject it if we use it second time.
# To avoid this, I added a few lines that creates random e-mail addresses for registration purposes

steps.name: User enters a randomly generated email
User clicks on the submit button
User should land on home page

comments.value: # You can select a browser as chrome" or "firefox" by simply entering your choice to properties/config.properties file
# Then Bonigarcia’s webdriver manager will take care of the rest

elements.name: User lands on check24 page, then navigates to registiration page
Verify that user cannot register when entering very short password.

comments.value: # Again, I used random e-mail address for the sake of the test case

steps.name: User enters randomly generated email and following details for registration
User clicks on the submit button
User should be notified with "Das Passwort sollte zwischen 6 und 50 Zeichen lang sein." on password error

arguments.val: Das Passwort sollte zwischen 6 und 50 Zeichen lang sein.
